id: client-cancel-payments-initiation-v-4
title: "[CLIENT IMPLEMENTATION] Cancel Payment Initiations by ConsentPactualId"
description: "[CLIENT IMPLEMENTATION] Endpoint that our client must implement to receive Payment Initiations Cancellations by consentPactualId, this endpoint must behave exactly as the specified on the  [Open Banking Brazil Oficial Documentation](https://openfinancebrasil.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/OF/pages/239337826/Informa+es+T+cnicas+-+SV+Pagamentos+-+v4.0.0-beta.4), regarding the request, that must be implemented as specified on this Documentation. The path can be parametrized by the client, it is just a suggestion, the client endpoint must accept the paymentId variable, it can be either on the path or as query parameter."
sidebar_label: "[CLIENT IMPLEMENTATION] Cancel Payment Initiations by ConsentPactualId"

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"[CLIENT IMPLEMENTATION] Cancel Payment Initiations by ConsentPactualId"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"patch"}
  path={"/client-implementation/pix/payments/v4/cancel/consent/{consentPactualId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



[CLIENT IMPLEMENTATION] Endpoint that our client must implement to receive Payment Initiations Cancellations by consentPactualId, this endpoint must behave exactly as the specified on the  [Open Banking Brazil Oficial Documentation](https://openfinancebrasil.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/OF/pages/239337826/Informa+es+T+cnicas+-+SV+Pagamentos+-+v4.0.0-beta.4), regarding the request, that must be implemented as specified on this Documentation. The path can be parametrized by the client, it is just a suggestion, the client endpoint must accept the paymentId variable, it can be either on the path or as query parameter.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"consentPactualId","description":"The Consent PactualId","schema":{"format":"uuid","type":"string"},"in":"path","required":true}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"description":"Payment Initiation Cancellation request that will be sent by BaaS to the Client, to cancel all payments of a consent","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"description":"","required":["data"],"type":"object","properties":{"data":{"required":["status","cancellation"],"type":"object","properties":{"status":{"description":"Used to inform which status the payment should be updated.","enum":["CANC"],"type":"string","title":"CancellationStatus"},"cancellation":{"description":"","required":["cancelledBy"],"type":"object","properties":{"cancelledBy":{"description":"","required":["document"],"type":"object","properties":{"document":{"description":"Object containing document information","required":["identification","rel"],"type":"object","properties":{"identification":{"description":"The number of the document","type":"string","title":"Identification"},"rel":{"description":"The type of document (CPF/CNPJ)","type":"string","title":"Rel"}},"title":"Document"}},"title":"CancelledBy"}},"title":"Cancellation"}}}},"title":"PaymentInitiationCancellationRequest"}}},"required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
